page.syntax: C Interface_Names(C ProgId, C TypeName [,C Format])
page.description: Get the properties and methods in a single list for an interface referenced by an OLE automation object or control

section.title: Discussion
section.description: For internal use only. Get the properties and methods in a single list for an interface referenced by an OLE automation object or control.

item.name: M - Prototype string without return type
P - Prototype string with return type
U - Globally Unique Identifier of the Class
V - Type Kind of the Class
